short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download a menu from a Just Eat restaurant webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Just Eat - Download CSV Chrome extension lets you download the entire menu for any restaurant on Just Eat.

Simply:
1. navigate to the page for a specific restaurant on Just Eat, then
2. click the "Download CSV" button on the top right of the webpage.

The extension will then scroll down to the bottom of the webpage, extract all the menu information and send it to you as a CSV file. The CSV file can then be opened in Microsoft Excel or any other spreadsheet software. (e.g. OpenOffice, LibreOffice etc.).
